item.title: SML members @bae_inhwan @isabellemcdaph @haesooheatherk and Julia Sebastien had a lovely meeting with the students @btf_bluetree about youth social media safety! It was great to chat, @ParkChanJun_ , thank you for inviting us! #bluetreefoundation

item.title: We are excited to welcome Han Li, @HanLi_1231 to SML! Han joined our collaborative project on "Deterring Objectionable Behaviors Online," socialsciences.cornell.edu/deterring-objeâ€¦Â  She comes to us after her postdoc at the NUS where she worked with Dr. Renwen Zhang (@renwenzhang).
